pr_title: [dart][dart-dio] Use built_value collection types without string replacement

timeline.message: [dart-dio] Use built_value collection types without string replacement

timeline.author: agilob

timeline.bodyText: can you add unit tests to this method?
timeline.author: agilob

replies.bodyText: There are tests for dart and dart-dio that test the type returned for array and map OAS types.
replies.author: kuhnroyal

timeline.bodyText: can you add unit tests for this method? is it worth to make it more dart-dio specific as the rest of the changes are dart-dio?
timeline.author: agilob

replies.bodyText: Could possibly be moved to the dart-dio generator.
replies.author: kuhnroyal

replies.bodyText: makes sense to keep it here for all darts.
replies.author: agilob
